thread.title: Dataprise Names Todd Mitchell Chief Operating Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Dataprise Names Todd Mitchell Chief Operating Officer
text:
ROCKVILLE, Md., Feb. 28, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Dataprise , a leading managed IT services provider, announces the appointment of Todd Mitchell as Chief Operating Officer. Mitchell has over 18 years of management experience building and executing business strategy and operational efficiency in the technology field, from both an entrepreneurial and large-scale business perspective.
"Todd is a consummate and seasoned professional with significant experience in structured operations and managing both financial and growth strategies at a large corporate level," states David Eisner, CEO of Dataprise. "We're confident that he will help bring Dataprise to the next level of success while keeping consistent the best-in-class service our customers have come to expect."
As COO, Mitchell will be responsible for implementing and overseeing all customer facing and service delivery functions and ensuring the proper operational controls, procedures, and systems are in place to effectively grow and ensure operational excellence throughout Dataprise.
"Dataprise has over 23 years of experience building a company and culture where people care deeply about customers and work tirelessly to deliver exceptional service," states Mitchell. "The committed, dedicated, persistent, and technically minded staff are an unequivocal competitive advantage for Dataprise and I am proud to join the team and continue that passion as we look forward to the future in service delivery and customer growth."
Mitchell brings extensive insight on strategic expansion in the technical industry. Prior to joining Dataprise, he served as Vice President for Rackspace, a managed cloud computing company, where he was responsible for corporate strategy and led two of Rackspace's largest business units, representing $1.4B in annualized revenue with positive year-over-year growth. Previous to that, Mitchell was the Vice President of Strategic Planning for SoftLayer Technologies, now IBM Cloud, where he was responsible for product management, business development and large partner strategic planning and management and executed successful expansions in Asia and Europe.
ABOUT DATAPRISE
Dataprise is a leading IT managed services provider that helps growing businesses throughout the nation by working with them to manage, leverage, and maximize their technology. With comprehensive and scalable Support 365 Â® managed services , Dataprise uniquely meets the needs of businesses by offering a holistic and personalized approach to IT strategy, management, security solutions, help desk support, and cloud services. Dataprise creates a one-of-a-kind customer experience through its focus on its core values and strives to provide each business with an unfair competitive advantage through IT.
